title: How to use Google Bard: What to do and what not to do
description: You no longer need to join a waitlist to try out Google's AI chatbot, Bard. Here's everything you need to know to use it.

title: The search for a 5g killer app that's 'bigger than connectivity'
description: Industry observers agree that 5G represents a new frontier of innovation. To push the boundaries, these tech and telecom giants have joined the 5G OI Lab's ecosystem.

title: iPhone 15 Pro users can replace Siri with ChatGPT. Here's how
description: With the tap of the Action button, you can start chatting with ChatGPT.

title: How to create a Kanban board in the MacOS Sonoma Reminders app
description: If you'd like to incorporate the power of Kanban boards into your daily life, MacOS Sonoma's Reminders app has a handy trick up its sleeve.

title: Asian banks are a favorite target of cybercooks, and malicious bots their preferred tool
description: Asia-Pacific is the second-most targeted region for malicious bot requests against financial services, with global hubs Singapore, Australia, and Japan the region's top three most targeted, accounting for the bulk of web application and API attacks.

title: How to add widgets to your MacOS Sonoma desktop
description: MacOS Sonoma leans into the same Widgets that are taking iOS by storm. Here's how you can add them to your desktop.

title: How to save money on groceries with Amazon Prime
description: Trying to save money on groceries these days? Trim down your grocery bill with these Prime membership hacks.

title: These $200 wireless headphones are the best it gets at this price point
description: Audio-Technica's new ATH-M50xBT2 are a worthy successor to an already fantastic pair of headphones.

title: Fitbit's new fitness tracker adds Google features we've all been waiting for
description: The Fitbit Charge 6 offers a sleek form factor and deeper integration into the Google ecosystem. Here's everything new.

title: Can AI code? In baby steps only
description: Don't give up your coding career. Studies have shown generative AI does only a so-so job of coding, and fails spectacularly on hard problems.

title: ChatGPT can finally access the internet in real time, but there's a catch
description: OpenAI fixes its chatbot's major limitations. However, the new functionality is only available to some users.

title: Disney+ password sharing crackdown officially begins
description: A recent email to subscribers threatened account termination if passwords were shared outside the household.

title: Microsoft is testing an AI-powered image creator for Windows 11 Paint
description: Based on OpenAI's DALL-E text-to-image platform, Paint Cocreator will conjure up images in Windows Paint based on your descriptions.

title: iPhone users get even more browser options as Vivaldi for iOS arrives
description: The mobile version of Vivaldi's web browser is now available for iOS and iPadOS users, delivering more choices and more flexibility.

title: Get Microsoft Office on your PC or Mac for just $50
description: Buy a lifetime license to Microsoft Office 2021 for 75% off right now, to get Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and more on your computer.

title: The Raspberry Pi 5 is here, and it comes with some huge improvements
description: More than double the CPU performance and a whole raft of other features and improvements make this an exciting release.

title: What is Android's new Ad Topics feature and how do you disable it?
description: Android now has a feature that keeps tabs on your topics of interest, based on the apps you use. If you'd like to disable this new tracking option, here's how.

title: These new AR smartglasses bet big on audio and ChatGPT and start at $199
description: I tried the new Solos AirGo3 smartglasses and they combine comfort, fitness, ChatGPT integration, an excellent app, and lots of style options.
